name: Till Seyfarth
text: 1/2 build your own pizza + salad is such a great combo! One of our favorite places for a quick lunch. 2020 made the salads less interesting for supply chain reasons apparently, but still worth it! They are nice to dogs, too :-)

name: Jeffry here
text: Pizza was good artisan food. Wish that there was a menu on the wall you stand by, like Costa Vida has in their business model. Most employees were kind. Tasty beverages. Very tasty.

name: Sara J. Culp
text: I have never been disappointed with my food here. The high rise red vine is my go to! And the lemonade is delicious too.

name: James Rich
text: Great and consistent pizza. Best pizza you‚Äôll get in Eagle. Especially if you need gluten free crust. This location seems quieter than the one in Meridian. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brad Murphy
text: We love Blaze! A favorite spot for our family to let everyone get what they want.  Celiac friendly Gluten Free options. They deserve five stars. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Thompson
text: Tate was awesome.  Very cheerful and a nice greeter!  Only a few shifts in and very good already. She‚Äôs a keeper‚Äî and I don‚Äôt know her... :)

name: Susan Abrams
text: Best pizza in the entire northwest region, maybe even the US or quite honestly the entire world. The employees were sweet and very personable. I needed some extra pepperoni and they added a heap of it for no extra charge. Such a great experience and will return!

name: Michael Baxter
text: Great personal pizzas. Love the high-rise dough option. The build your own option is my favorite. Go down the line and tell them what you want and toppings all for one price. Have a small beer selection too

name: Darren Anderson
text: Good pizza, super good crust.  They assemble to order, kind of like Subway, but have lots of recommendation for what goes good with what, super friendly and nice atmosphere.

name: Sandra Langstaff
text: Excellent pizza delivered every time. The orders have been perfect and delivered quickly. Our favorite pizza!

text: The pizza is so good but this place seriously needs to reconsider its ordering process. Things should not take as long as they do to get food. They can‚Äôt handle even a short line without it taking 20+ mins. They need to get their ordering down or I don‚Äôt think I can go anymore.

text: Best pizza in town. Customer service is below average...treat you like you are doing them a favor.

text: My first experience here was an absolute delight. The employees' first question was "Have you been here before" which is extremely thoughtful. Pizza is nice and crispy, with tons of choices.

text: Always taste delicious. Allows me to make healthy concious choices. And I always leave with leftovers.

text: The pizza is great and the employees are amazing, however I have noticed a few significant problems my last couple visits. text: Great pizza. Great Service. Convenient new location. Although parking can be challenging, the interior seating design is much better than The Village location in Meridian. The employees are consistently upbeat and efficient.
